name: You are safe!
description: You may continue your turn. For now...

name: Collapsing Tunnel!
description: The walls begin to shake and collapse around you! Make a Strength saving throw.
on_success: You brace against the falling rocks and you dodge most of the falling rubble, but a few stones bruise you.
on_fail: You brace against the falling rocks but a heavy rock strikes you hard, leaving you battered!

name: Flame Trap!
description: You step on a dislocated pressure plate and jets of flame burst from hidden nozzles! Make an Agility saving throw.
on_success: You roll and dive, narrowly escaping the searing flames! You are grazed by the fire but avoid the worst of it.
on_fail: You roll and dive, trying to escape the searing flames but they engulf you, leaving painful burns!

name: Needle Trap!
description: As you pass a narrow hallway, tiny needles fire from hidden holes. Make a Instinct saving throw.
on_success: You twist and dodge gracefully, evading the needles!
on_fail: You feel sharp pricks as the needles puncture your skin!

name: Poison Trap!
description: You trip on a wire and trigger a hidden gas trap which releases a cloud of green mist! Make an Finesse saving throw.
on_success: You hold your breath and dart through the mist! You inhale a little poison but resist most of its effects.
on_fail: You try to hold your breath and dart through the mist but the toxic gas invades your lungs, weakening you!

name: Arcane Rune Trap!
description: You step on an ancient rune that triggers a magical backlash. Make a Knowledge saving throw.
on_success: You recognize the rune's pattern just in time to shield yourself and deflect its power!
on_fail: You do not recognize the rune's pattern and the full force of the rune explodes into you, burning your flesh and spirit!

name: The Haunting!
description: A ghostly song tempts you toward danger. Make a Charisma saving throw.
on_success: You resist the haunting melody, standing your ground!
on_fail: You are drawn forward helplessly into hidden danger!

name: Healing Potion!
description: You find a small healing potion. You regain some hit points!
